Submodules¶

lspy.localsearch.abstract_local_search module¶

class lspy.localsearch.abstract_local_search.AbstractLocalSearch¶

Bases: abc.ABC

Template for the implementation of local search algorithms.

This class should only contain the logic needed to run the local search. I/O and plotting should be handled by an AbstractRunner.

reset()¶

Resets the object back to it’s state after init.

Raises:NotImplementedError – Will always be raised.
run()¶

start running the local search

Returns:Contains the best found case and the evaluation value for said case.
Return type:collections.namedtuple

lspy
